verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:14
verses.text: And he appointed, according to the order of David his father, the courses of the priests to their service, and the Levites to their charges, to praise and minister before the priests, as the duty of every day required: the porters also by their courses at every gate: for so had David the man of God commanded.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:15
verses.text: And they departed not from the commandment of the king unto the priests and Levites concerning any matter, or concerning the treasures.
